app.name: Discord
app.long_description:
This program will let you use Discord on your Wii.
Features:
- Point and Click - Use your Wii Remote to navigate Discord's interface, and use the + Button on your Wii Remote to right click. - USB Keyboard - What kind of messaging app won't let you use your keyboard! Plug in a USB Keyboard to type on Discord. You can also use the shortcut commands you can use on a computer! - Wii Speak - You can voice chat on Discord with a Wii Speak! - Rich Presence - Discord can show what games/homebrew/Channels you are using with a nice rich presence plugin!
You need to have the Internet Channel installed to use Discord.
